description:
Part A: Chio-chan heads to her usual convenience store.
Part B: Eihira Private Girls’ Academy is a renowned school where only the richest girls go.
Part C: Chio-chan and Manana run into an old lady who’s always sitting in front of a café, all alone.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chio im Conbini / Kampf mit Chio
Chio à la supérette / Le duel de Chio / Les vestiges du jour
Convenience Store Chio-chan / Chio-chan and the Duel / Remnants of That Day
Konbini Chio-chan / Chio-chan to Kettou / Ano Hi no Omokage
コンビニちおちゃん / ちおちゃんと決闘 / あの日のおもかげ
